title: Ep. 232: The Future of Modeling, Tranexamic Acid & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 232: The Future of Modeling, Tranexamic Acid & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Tranexamic acid could be skincare’s next big thing, but what is it? We’ve got answers. Plus, we discuss how the modeling industry is changing for the better, and share the latest beauty news: Sephora’s new p...
description:
Tranexamic acid could be skincare’s next big thing, but what is it? We’ve got answers. Plus, we discuss how the modeling industry is changing for the better, and share the latest beauty news: Sephora’s new president, cult-favorite The Ordinary foundations arrive in the U.S., hits and misses at TRESemmé, a new (vegan!) red makeup pigment, and details on how one U.K. salon’s search for a happy hairstylist went wrong. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
